pageProduct.name: Scholl Velvet Smooth Electronic Foot File For Hard Skin - Pink
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Scholl Velvet Smooth Electronic Foot Care System for hard skin removal + dry skin exfoliation.

NEW and Improved Scholl Electronic Foot Care System for hard skin removal + dry skin exfoliation, brought to you by Scholl with 100 years of expertise!


Around the world 25million owners use our devices to get soft beautiful skin 


Key Features: 


- Can be used for Wet & Dry Skin


- New design for better handling


- Dual speed to adapt to your needs


- Includes 2 refill heads:  


- Extra Coarse Refill: to remove hard skin on the feet


- Exfoliating Refill:  to gently exfoliate dry, flaky skin on your feet and lower legs


 


Quicker and better results!*


*compared to manual methods

Boxed Contents: 1 x Electronic foot care system, 1 x Regular coarse roller head, 1 x Dry skin exfoliation brush, 4 x AA batteries.

Size: 1 Pack

Battery Included?: Yes

Battery Quantity: 4

Battery Type: AA

Shelf Life in Days: 730

Warnings

Connect correctly +/-. Do not recharge.

PRECAUTIONS

Coarse roller head: for use on hard skin of the feet only. Dry skin exfoliation brush: for use on feet and legs. Do not use the device anywhere else on the body. Only use for its intended purpose. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use in the same area for more than 3-4 seconds at a time. Stop use immediately if irritation or discomfort occurs. Do not use on broken, sore or irritated skin. Do not submerge the device in water. This product is not suitable for diabetics and those with thin skin or with poor blood circulation. Do not use exfoliation brush if you suffer from a dermatological condition. Keep long hair away from the device when in use.

Directions

Retain the outer packaging for future reference. See leaflet for full instructions.

USAGE ADVICE

Use the brush to gently exfoliate dry, flaky skin on your feet and lower legs to help reveal fresher looking skin. Helps your moisturiser to keep your skin soft and smooth.
Coarse roller head removes hard skin that builds up under pressure.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

01 PET, 21 PAP

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 1 PET(E)
